Text: Yeah, the important point is in the "so far"...

Season One = Episodes 1-26

Season Two = Episodes 27-52

There will not be a season three. This torrent is 1-42 with the bonus episodes.

I would like this with Swedish sound, but thanks for the up anyway...

ok thank you imagines for that info...just checked wiki, they say 2 seasons, 52 eps total. which means, we are 10 eps short.

well, atleast im now sure we have the full season 1 in here!

Dear Lezduur (the uploader if I'm not wrong),
It would be very kind of you if you could upload the unaired episodes given below or tell us the site where we can watch/download them. The unaired episodes you uploaded were included in Season 2 as episode #70 ,#77 and #78.The unaired episodes of season 2(acc. to Wikipedia) are as follows:
1.Alienated
2.The Otter Woman
3.Whispers and Coups
4.Brush With Danger
